研究将过多的屏幕时间与青少年的心理困扰联系起来根据一项发表的研究，他们每天花费三个多小时以上的久坐行为 - 包括玩视频游戏，阅读休闲或花费大量时间因屏幕分心 - 将来面临心理困扰的风险更高。青少年健康杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/study-links-excessive-screen-screen time to-psychology-distress-in-adecents.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/study-links-excessive-screen time to-to-psychology-distress-in-in-adecents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93A4D531-42ED-4657-9432-75D6B69062BF Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:35:08 -0500 Study links excessive screen time to psychological distress in adolescents
医生说的患者的语言与较低的心血管疾病风险有关积极的患者关系是对健康生活的一种组成部分，对关系中常见语言的影响可以通过减少心血管疾病而产生的新研究，从而造福更长的寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/doctors-speaking-the-patients-patients-language-lange-to-lower-to-lower-cardiaseasease-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/doctors-speaking-the-patients-langue-langue-lange-to-lower-to-lower-cardiaseaseasease-disease-risk-ask.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5671A043-3F27-42D7-9D93-10AE378DF31B Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:28:47 -0500 Doctors speaking the patient's language linked to lower cardiovascular disease risk
工程血管细胞在糖尿病治疗中增强胰岛移植成功在Weill Cornell Medicine研究者领导的一项临床前研究中，将工程化的人血管形成细胞添加到胰岛移植中，增强了产生胰岛素的细胞和逆转糖尿病的存活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/ deangineered-blood-vessel-celsel-cells-boost-islet-islet-transplant-transplant-success-cuccess-inccess-in-diabetes-wartment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/ deangineered-blood-vessel-celsel-cells-boost-islet-islet-transplant-transplant-success-uccescess-inccess-in-diabetes-wartment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3811A2B1-65A9-497A-9F98-76EAADE21EFD Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:14:00 -0500 Engineered blood vessel cells boost islet transplant success in diabetes treatment
靶向mRNA疗法显示出愈合受损肺的希望根据宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的新研究，mRNA和新的脂质纳米颗粒的结合可以帮助治愈受损的肺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/targeted-mrna-therapy-shows-shows-promise-promise-for-healing-healing-dmainged-lungs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/targeted-mrna-therapy-shows-shows-promise-promise-for-healing-healing-dmaged-lungs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7828D12E-734F-404B-B2D8-CD9344906EEE Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:09:13 -0500 Targeted mRNA therapy shows promise for healing damaged lungs
用于治疗心血管疾病的FDA批准设备心脏病，也称为心血管疾病，可能会带来严重的后果。这是美国食品药品监督管理局批准的美国医疗设备成人的主要死亡原因，例如起搏器和除颤器，已延长并改善了数百万患有心脏病的人的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/fda-apprast-devices-devices-dus-to-to-to-card-cardiascular-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/fda-appraved-devices-devices-dus-to-to-to-card-cardiascular-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AFDE09FB-97A2-4141-9185-9185-9AD255C9E011 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 13:58:59 -0500 FDA-approved devices used to treat cardiovascular diseases
新的脆弱指数有助于预测老年人的住院和死亡风险弥撒将军的调查人员开发了一种工具，可以识别出面对紧急医疗保健需求，再住院或死亡风险增加的老年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/new-frailty-index-helps-predict-hospitalization-hospitalization-and-death----------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/new-frailty-index-helps-predict-hospitalization-hospitalization-and-death--------------- in grod-inderds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c247283-acad-452e-452e-9dec-3c9b15b15b8ea02 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 13:52:00 -0500 New frailty index helps predict hospitalization and death risks in older adults
研究揭示了呼吸如何调节学生的大小和视力瑞典Karolinska Institutet的研究人员发现了一种影响学生大小的基本机制，即我们的呼吸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/study-reveals-how-breathing-reathing-regulates-pupil-size-and-vision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/study-reveals-how-breathing-reage--pupil-pupil-size-and-vision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ce1d3fc-7c9a-4889-8020-D74A03D946D5 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 13:44:22 -0500 Study reveals how breathing regulates pupil size and vision
肯尼索州立研究员赢得了著名的心脏病诊断创新奖肯尼索州立大学的研究员陈Zha（Chen Zhao）因其在心血管疾病诊断中的非侵入性血流预测中的独特研究而获得了2025年美国心脏协会机构研究增强奖（AIREA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/kennesaw-state-researcher-wins-wins-prestigious-prestigious-for for-award-disease-disease-diasease-diarostic-innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/kennesaw-state-researcher-wins-wins-prestigious-prestigious-for for-award-disease-disease-disease-dianostic-innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61905E7D-D3C8-4140-B14A-719F6F6FDFD231 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 13:36:23 -0500 Kennesaw State researcher wins prestigious award for heart disease diagnostic innovation
在小学生中对抗头虱的有效方法头虱每年都会影响数百万儿童。学童通常受头虱的影响，这些虱子附着在头发上并以人的血为食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/effective-ways-to-combat-head-lice-lice-in-schoolchildren.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/effective-ways-to-combat-head-lice-lice-in-schoolchildren.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A41824C0-1B6F-456B-456B-AE34-9B86ECB5AD7A Fri, 21 Feb 2025 13:28:59 -0500 Effective ways to combat head lice in schoolchildren
得克萨斯州麻疹爆发接近100例，引起了人们对未发现差异的担忧由于西得克萨斯州的麻疹爆发迅速升级，一些私立学校关闭了。当地卫生部门过度拉伸，暂停了其他重要的工作，因为它们限制了这种高度传染性病毒的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/texas-measles-ust break-nears-nears-nears-100-cases-cases-conisis-concerns-concerns-about-about-undeted-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/texas-measles-ust break-nears-nears-nears-nears-100-cases-raisish-conising-concerns-concerns-about-about-undetected-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf26E535-717D-4CDB-802F-270419F0C144 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 13:19:53 -0500 Texas measles outbreak nears 100 cases, raising concerns about undetected spread
